where the pit depth is more than 3 m, be provided through an access doorway complying with the following:
In lieu of D2D7 to D2D11, the doorway must be level with the pit floor and not be less than 600 mm wide by 1980 mm high clear opening, which may be reduced to 1500 mm where it is necessary to comply with (ii).
No part of the lift car or platform must encroach on the pit doorway entrance when the car is on a fully compressed buffer.
Access to the doorway must be by a stairway complying with AS 1657.
In lieu of D3D26, doors fitted to the doorway must be—
of the horizontal sliding or outwards opening hinged type; and
self-closing and self-locking from the outside; and
marked on the landing side with the letters not less than 35 mm high:DANGER LIFTWELL – ENTRY OF UNAUTHORIZED PERSONS PROHIBITED – KEEP CLEAR AT ALL TIMES
